articles.title: Shikhar Dhawan passes verdict on Virat Kohli taking rest from WI, Zimbabwe tour - Hindustan Times
articles.description: With Kohli continuing to opt for rest with the T20 World Cup just two months away, experts have expressed their concern. And amid the criticisms, veteran India opener Shikhar Dhawan has given his verdict on the same.
articles.content: Former India skipper Virat Kohli has been not just faced immense criticism of late for his struggles with the bat but also for opting for rest from white-ball series. Veterans and experts are of the … [+1929 chars]
